dead_hang_active.description: Start with a passive hang, relax shoulders. After 30s, engage scapula to pull slightly without bending arms and hold for another 30s.

kb_swing.description: Hinge at hips, swing kettlebell between legs and explosively extend hips to swing to chest height.

pallof_press.description: Press band straight from chest and hold to resist rotation.

band_pull_apart.description: Hold resistance band at chest level, pull apart until shoulder blades squeeze together.

couch_stretch.description: Stretch hip flexors by placing back foot on wall or bench behind you, keeping torso upright.

glute_bridge.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, lift hips by driving through heels, squeeze glutes at top.

single_leg_rdl.description: Balance on one leg, hinge forward at hips while extending opposite leg backward.

hollow_hold.description: Lie on back, lift legs and shoulders, keep lower back pressed to floor.

child_pose.description: Sit back on heels, reach arms forward, and relax torso toward floor.
